All functions

Calculate incidence rates

Calculate prevalence rates

Calculate prevalence series rates

Curate diagnostic data

Example diagnostic individual-level data

Filter demographic data by selected filtering parameters
filter_diag()
Validate and filter diagnostic data by selected ICD-10 codes
get_population_ssb()
Get yearly population data from SSB, by region, sex and age.

Harmonize old municipality codes in Norway to 2024 municipality codes

Norwegian municipalities valid in 2016

Link diagnostic and demographic datasets using unique personal identifiers

Plot prevalence/incidence rates

Read and validate the structure of demographic individual-level data
